scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development rm settings.js && cp ../settings-dev.js settings.js && electron .
scripts.start-prod: NODE_ENV=production rm settings.js && cp ../settings-prod.js settings.js && electron .
scripts.build-win: cd ..\client\ && grunt build && xcopy dist ..\server\dist /S /I /Y && cd ..\server && del /F /S /Q /A settings.js && copy /Y ..\settings-prod.js settings.js && electron-packager . uMaster --overwrite --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=1.2.2 --asar=true && xcopy ..\scripts uMaster-win32-ia32\resources\scripts /S /I /Y && rd /s /q dist
scripts.build-osx: rm -rf uMaster-darwin-x64 && cd ../client && grunt build && mkdir ../server/dist && cp -R dist/ ../server/dist && cd ../server && rm settings.js && cp ../settings-prod.js settings.js && electron-packager . uMaster --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=1.2.2 --asar=true --icon=icon.icns && rm -rf dist/ && cp -R ../scripts uMaster-darwin-x64/uMaster.app/Contents/Resources/scripts
scripts.dist: NODE_ENV=production rm -rf dist && rm settings.js && cd ../client && grunt build && cp -R dist/ ../server/public && cd ../server && cp ../settings-prod.js settings.js && build && rm -rf public/
scripts.dist-win: rd /s /q dist && del /F /S /Q /A settings.js && copy /Y ..\settings-prod.js settings.js && cd ..\client\ && grunt build && xcopy dist ..\server\public /S /I /Y && cd ..\server && build && rd /s /q public
